name: Bounce Airlie Beach
description:
Welcome to Bounce Airlie Beach - A tropical paradise located in the heart of the reef!

A brand new property that has opened it's doors in August 2024 - Exciting New Chapter for the Bounce Brand! 

Embark on a fresh and vibrant experience at Bounce Airlie Beach, our newest addition opened its doors in August 2024. Tailored for the modern traveller, our social living concept offers various sizes of dorm rooms, making it the ideal choice for solo adventurers, newly found travel-besties and groups of friends.

Come explore the beauty of Airlie Beach, a tropical paradise in the heart of the Great barrier Reef. We are only a few steps away from the vibrant Airlie Beach main street and harbour, lined with restaurants, cafes, shops and bars. Or jump on a boat from the marina and get out to Whitehaven Beach, with the whitest of sand and the bluest of water, you will see why it is the most famous beach in Australia.

A Tropical Oasis of Style and Community Living:
Immerse yourself in sleek and modern design with a touch of beachside sophistication.
Bounce Airlie Beach promises a distinctive accommodation experience - a place so inviting, you may find it hard to bid farewell!

Prime Location:
Ideally situated, Bounce Airlie Beach is just a heartbeat away from the captivating beauty of the Airlie Beach Lagoon. Enjoy easy access to boat trips, dining options, and the lively atmosphere. Our property is designed for those seeking a social and communal experience, with the heart of Airlie Beach at your doorstep.

● Check-In: 2pm
● Check-Out: 10am

Booking & Payment Policies:
● Secure your reservation with your credit card; payment is due 24 hours prior to your check-in date.
● Payment options: MasterCard, Visa.
● Non-refundable after check-in.
● Please note there is a 2.7% charge when you pay with a Visa or MasterCard credit card.
● Valid passport or drivers license required at check-in; strictly an 18-35 property.

Group Bookings:
● Bookings of 4+ guests are welcome. Separate terms & conditions apply; our team will provide details post-booking.

Cancellation Policies:
● No-show or cancellations within 24 hours incur a non-refundable charge.
● Changes must be agreed upon before check-in.
● Failure to arrive results in reservation cancellation.

Vibrant Community Spaces:
● Experience the heart of our property in our communal spaces. Connect with fellow travellers, share stories, and enjoy the vibrant social atmosphere.

On-Site Amenities:
● We have a licensed bar on site, and so you may not consume your own alcohol on the property at any time. Failure to comply will result in immediate removal from the property.

At Bounce Airlie Beach, let the tropical allure, modern social living, and the prime location near Airlie Beach Lagoon allows you to redefine your travel experience.

houseRules.notes:
Check-in: 2pm
Check-out: 10am 

Cancellation Policies: 
-You have free cancellation up until 24 hours before your check-in date.
-If you cancel within 24 hours of your check-in date you will be charged 1 night's rate per person and this is non-refundable. 

Things to Note: 
Booking & Payment Policies: 
-Your credit card details have been collected to secure your reservation and you will be required to pay for all accommodation 24 hours prior to your check-in date.
-We have a strict 18-35 years of age policy to stay in our dorm room accommodation.
-Once checked-in, your reservation is non-refundable.  
-Please note there is a 2.7% charge when you pay with a Visa or MasterCard credit card.
-You must present a valid passport or driver's license at check-in, failure to do so may result in cancellation of your booking. 

Christmas and New Year
-The full remaining cost of any booking for stays between the 22nd of December and the 9th of January (inclusive) must be paid at the time of booking. You will be contacted shortly after booking with further details from Bounce Airlie. Payment can be made by bank transfer or the credit card nominated at the time of booking. Failure to respond to Bounce Airlie’s communications within 7 days after booking your booking will be cancelled. All bookings that have not been prepaid by the 1st of December will be cancelled. Please note that should you wish to alter the booking at all, this will only be possible before the 1st of December. 

Please note we have a licensed bar on site, we operate a STRICTLY NO BYO policy.
